subject: World Series
Baseball
lead_paragraph: As they try to battle back from being two games down in the A.L.C.S., the Yankees’ most vivid inspiration is their forebears’ comeback in the 1958 World Series.
snippet: As they try to battle back from being two games down in the A.L.C.S., the Yankees’ most vivid inspiration is their forebears’ comeback in the 1958 World Series.
